transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ritu madam?
Customer: Sir link share kar do na.
Executive: Ritu madam?
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji madam.
Customer: Sir link share karo na.
Executive: Ha ha ha link share karenge aapko. Ha WhatsApp pe bhej dena. Ha ha aapki jo register mail id hai wo open kijiye.
Customer: Register mail id pe mat bhejiye sir.
Executive: Register mail id pe bhejiye. WhatsApp kar denge to better hoga na register mail id actually boss ke paas hai.
Executive: To aapke paas jo available mail id hai. Wo le lijiye sahi hai to. Main WhatsApp kar do aapko. Just wait sir. Just wait.
Customer: Aap bilkul WhatsApp kijiye mujhe.
Customer: WhatsApp kiya ek second mein.
Hmm.
Customer: Kiya sir WhatsApp. Warming aisa.
Customer: Ek second mein WhatsApp kar diya dekh lo.
Executive: WhatsApp kar diya aapne? Ji ji.

Executive: Theek hai. Ji aapki mail id mil gayi.
Customer: Bhej diya aapne?

Executive: Ha ha maine bhej diya. Outlook hai na sir thoda paanch minute dijiye na ho jayega.
Customer: Ji. Outlook hai na sir outlook mein mail thoda time lagta hai sir jaise aata hai na joint hoti hu.
Customer: Mujhe aise mail bhej dijiye hote main aapko inform karti hu sir.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested the executive to share link.

- Customer wants the link on WhatsApp, not email.



Resolution:

- Executive shared the link on WhatsApp.

- Executive confirmed receiving customer's email ID.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will inform the executive after joining.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- link, whatsapp, email, registered mail id
